column3: How would you rate your comfort level with mobile apps?

column3: Very comfortable - I use many apps daily
column33: Not sure but lately my best phases of deep work grind phases lasting weeks were best when I wasn't on my phone at all ie screen time <30m a day. I stopped thinking about the phone entirely, if I could track or it could do some of the tracking without me having to pull it out would be sick. I know thats an insanely hard thing to implement but yeah

column3: Very comfortable - I use many apps daily

column32: How to make the app outstanding among too many similarities

column3: Very comfortable - I use many apps daily
column15: I love the sharing and encourage part
column31: I really like the "Aggregated Cohort" view. It feels supportive to see my group's collective progress without the pressure of sharing my private reflections or competing on a leaderboard.
column32: Sometimes I want to send a short "Keep it up" text message to the group, but I can't.
column33: Add a "Team Milestone" celebration feature that unlocks something special
